import React, { useState } from "react"; import logo from "../assets/logo.png"; import { Formik, Form, Field, ErrorMessage } from "formik"; import * as Yup from "yup"; const RegisterForm = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, swtPassword] = useState(""); const [username, setUsername] = useState(""); console.log(email); const validationSchema = Yup.object().shape({ firstName: Yup.string().required("First Name is required"), lastName: Yup.string().required("Last Name is required"), email: Yup.string().email("Email is invalid").required("Email is required"), password: Yup.string() .min(6, "Password must be at least 6 characters") .required("Password is required"), confirmPassword: Yup.string() .oneOf([Yup.ref("password"), null], "Passwords must match") .required("Confirm Password is required"), }); return ( { alert("SUCCESS!! :-)\n\n" + JSON.stringify(fields, null, 4)); }} render={({ errors, status, touched }) => (
)} /> ); }; export default RegisterForm;
